resources.string: Camera access is required to distribution the video data.
Network access is required to distribution the video data.
Permission is not available. Requesting camera permission.
Permission is not available. Requesting network permission.
It is set to display location information on the encoded distribution video. If you do not want to display location information, please disable it from the settings of this app.
Audio distribution is enabled. If you don\'t want to stream audio, please disable it from the settings of this app.

Check audio microphone permissions in system settings.
